trans-unit.source: Describes encryption and signature requirements that apply to different parts of messages that are transmitted on this channel.
trans-unit.target: 암호화 및이 채널에서 전송 되는 메시지의 다른 부분에 적용 되는 서명 요구 사항에 설명 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When extending the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement> class, you must implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement.GetProperty%60%601%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext%29> so that it returns an instance of this class corresponding to the binding element.
trans-unit.target: 확장 하는 경우는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>구현 해야 클래스는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement.GetProperty%60%601%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext%29>바인딩 요소에 해당 하는이 클래스의 인스턴스를 반환 합니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement.GetProperty%60%601%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: This default constructor sets the following properties to a new instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification>, which is a class that specifies which parts are included in a message: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.IncomingEncryptionParts%2A>, - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.IncomingSignatureParts%2A>, - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.OutgoingEncryptionParts%2A>, and - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.OutgoingSignatureParts%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이 기본 생성자의 새 인스턴스로 다음 속성을 설정 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification>, 메시지에 포함 되는 부분을 지정 하는 클래스인:- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.IncomingEncryptionParts%2A>,- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.IncomingSignatureParts%2A>,- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.OutgoingEncryptionParts%2A>, 및- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.OutgoingSignatureParts%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.OutgoingSignatureParts%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.OutgoingEncryptionParts%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.IncomingSignatureParts%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.IncomingEncryptionParts%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements"></xref> class from another instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements"> </xref> 이 클래스의 다른 인스턴스에서 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the following properties to a new instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification>, using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification.%23ctor%2A> constructor, with `other` as the input parameter.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자의 새 인스턴스로 다음 속성을 설정 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification>를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification.%23ctor%2A>생성자와 `other` 입력된 매개 변수로.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification> is a class that specifies which parts are included in a message: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.IncomingEncryptionParts%2A>, - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.IncomingSignatureParts%2A>, - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.OutgoingEncryptionParts%2A>, and - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.OutgoingSignatureParts%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification>메시지에 포함 되는 부분을 지정 하는 클래스:- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.IncomingEncryptionParts%2A>,- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.IncomingSignatureParts%2A>,- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.OutgoingEncryptionParts%2A>, 및- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.OutgoingSignatureParts%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.OutgoingSignatureParts%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.OutgoingEncryptionParts%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.IncomingSignatureParts%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.IncomingEncryptionParts%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification>

trans-unit.source: The other instance of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 다른 인스턴스가 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: other is .
trans-unit.target: otheris .

trans-unit.source: Adds the parts collections in the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements"></xref> to the current instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 부분 컬렉션을 추가 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements"> </xref> 이 클래스의 현재 인스턴스에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds the various parts collections in the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements"></xref> to the current instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 다양 한 부분 컬렉션을 추가 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements"> </xref> 이 클래스의 현재 인스턴스에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the scope is channel-only.
trans-unit.target: 범위가 채널 전용인 지 여부를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of this class with incoming and outgoing parts reversed.
trans-unit.target: 들어오는 부분과 나가는 부분이 뒤바뀐으로이 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Incoming parts of the current instance of this class become outgoing parts of the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스의 현재 인스턴스의 들어오는 부분이 새 인스턴스의 나가는 부분이 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Outgoing parts of the current instance of this class become incoming parts of the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스의 현재 인스턴스의 나가는 부분이 새 인스턴스의 들어오는 부분이 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of this class with incoming and outgoing parts reversed.
trans-unit.target: 들어오는 부분과 나가는 부분이이 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 반대로 바뀝니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of message parts that are encrypted for messages from client to server.
trans-unit.target: 서버에 클라이언트에서 메시지에 대 한 암호화 된 메시지 부분의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is set in the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 생성자에서 설정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of message parts that are signed for messages from client to server.
trans-unit.target: 클라이언트에서 서버로 보내지는 메시지를 위해 서명 되는 메시지 부분의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is set in the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 생성자에서 설정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this instance of the class is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 클래스의이 인스턴스가 읽기 전용인 지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this instance of the class is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>클래스의이 인스턴스는 읽기 전용 이면 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets this class and its part collections to read-only.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스와 해당 부분 컬렉션을 읽기 전용으로 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.IsReadOnly%2A> is set to true, as are the corresponding properties on the parts collections.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.IsReadOnly%2A>부분 컬렉션에 해당 속성은 true로 설정 됩니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of message parts that are encrypted for messages from server to client.
trans-unit.target: 클라이언트에 서버에서 메시지에 대 한 암호화 된 메시지 부분의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is set in the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 생성자에서 설정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of message parts that are signed for messages from server to client.
trans-unit.target: 서버에서 클라이언트로 보내지는 메시지를 위해 서명 되는 메시지 부분의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is set in the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 생성자에서 설정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.
